mapper.sql: c.`id` as c_id , c.`login_name` as c_login_name , c.`password` as c_password , c.`md5_password` as c_md5_password , c.`user_name` as c_user_name , c.`first_name` as c_first_name , c.`last_name` as c_last_name , c.`address` as c_address , c.`email` as c_email , c.`phone` as c_phone , c.`cellphone` as c_cellphone , c.`status` as c_status , c.`invoice_post` as c_invoice_post , c.`register_date` as c_register_date , c.`active_date` as c_active_date , c.`balance` as c_balance , c.`title` as c_title , c.`birth` as c_birth , c.`driver_licence` as c_driver_licence , c.`passport` as c_passport , c.`country` as c_country , c.`company_name` as c_company_name , c.`identity_type` as c_identity_type , c.`identity_number` as c_identity_number , c.`result` as c_result

co.`id` as co_id , co.`order_serial` as co_order_serial , co.`customer_id` as co_customer_id , co.`order_total_price` as co_order_total_price , co.`order_create_date` as co_order_create_date , co.`order_status` as co_order_status , co.`order_using_start` as co_order_using_start , co.`next_invoice_create_date` as co_next_invoice_create_date , co.`next_invoice_create_date_flag` as co_next_invoice_create_date_flag , co.`order_type` as co_order_type , co.`order_broadband_type` as co_order_broadband_type , co.`svlan` as co_svlan , co.`cvlan` as co_cvlan , co.`transition_provider_name` as co_transition_provider_name , co.`transition_account_holder_name` as co_transition_account_holder_name , co.`transition_account_number` as co_transition_account_number , co.`transition_porting_number` as co_transition_porting_number , co.`hardware_post` as co_hardware_post , co.`order_due` as co_order_due , co.`pstn_count` as co_pstn_count , co.`pstn_rental_amount` as co_pstn_rental_amount , co.`term_period` as co_term_period , co.`pppoe_loginname` as co_pppoe_loginname , co.`pppoe_password` as co_pppoe_password , co.`sale_id` as co_sale_id , co.`order_pdf_path` as co_order_pdf_path , co.`credit_pdf_path` as co_credit_pdf_path , co.`signature` as co_signature , co.`optional_request` as co_optional_request , co.`broadband_asid` as co_broadband_asid , co.`rfs_date` as co_rfs_date , co.`previous_provider_invoice` as co_previous_provider_invoice , co.`user_id` as co_user_id , co.`ddpay_pdf_path` as co_ddpay_pdf_path , co.`is_ddpay` as co_is_ddpay , co.`ordering_form_pdf_path` as co_ordering_form_pdf_path , co.`receipt_pdf_path` as co_receipt_pdf_path , co.`disconnected_date` as co_disconnected_date , co.`connection_date` as co_connection_date , co.`contract` as co_contract , co.`inviter_customer_id` as co_inviter_customer_id , co.`inviter_user_id` as co_inviter_user_id , co.`inviter_rate` as co_inviter_rate , co.`invitee_rate` as co_invitee_rate
, co.`title` as co_title , co.`first_name` as co_first_name , co.`last_name` as co_last_name , co.`address` as co_address , co.`mobile` as co_mobile , co.`phone` as co_phone , co.`email` as co_email , co.`customer_type` as co_customer_type
, co.`org_name` as co_org_name , co.`org_type` as co_org_type , co.`org_trading_name` as co_org_trading_name , co.`org_register_no` as co_org_register_no , co.`org_incoporate_date` as co_org_incoporate_date , co.`org_trading_months` as co_org_trading_months , co.`holder_name` as co_holder_name , co.`holder_job_title` as co_holder_job_title , co.`holder_phone` as co_holder_phone , co.`holder_email` as co_holder_email
, co.`xero_invoice_status` as co_xero_invoice_status , co.`is_send_xero_invoice` as co_is_send_xero_invoice

cod.`id` as cod_id, cod.`order_id` as cod_order_id, cod.`detail_name` as cod_detail_name, cod.`detail_desc` as cod_detail_desc, cod.`detail_price` as cod_detail_price, cod.`detail_data_flow` as cod_detail_data_flow, cod.`detail_plan_status` as cod_detail_plan_status, cod.`detail_plan_type` as cod_detail_plan_type, cod.`detail_plan_sort` as cod_detail_plan_sort, cod.`detail_plan_group` as cod_detail_plan_group, cod.`detail_plan_new_connection_fee` as cod_detail_plan_new_connection_fee, cod.`detail_term_period` as cod_detail_term_period, cod.`detail_topup_data_flow` as cod_detail_topup_data_flow, cod.`detail_topup_fee` as cod_detail_topup_fee, cod.`detail_plan_memo` as cod_detail_plan_memo, cod.`detail_unit` as cod_detail_unit, cod.`detail_calling_minute` as cod_detail_calling_minute, cod.`detail_type` as cod_detail_type, cod.`detail_is_next_pay` as cod_detail_is_next_pay, cod.`detail_expired` as cod_detail_expired, cod.`is_post` as cod_is_post, cod.`hardware_comment` as cod_hardware_comment, cod.`track_code` as cod_track_code, cod.`pstn_number` as cod_pstn_number, cod.`user_id` as cod_user_id, cod.`voip_password` as cod_voip_password, cod.`voip_assign_date` as cod_voip_assign_date

choose.when: co.id LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.customer_id LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.last_name LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.email LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.address LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.broadband_asid LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') or co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_invoice where id LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') ) or co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_order_detail where detail_type='pstn' and pstn_number LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') ) or co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_order_detail where detail_type='voip' and pstn_number LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.keyword}', '%') )

when.if: or co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_order_detail where detail_type='pstn' and pstn_number LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.pstn}', '%') )
or co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_order_detail where detail_type='voip' and pstn_number LIKE CONCAT('%', '${params.voip}', '%') )

choose.when: co.id NOT IN(SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM tm_customer_invoice) and co.sale_id = #{params.sale_id}

co.order_status = #{params.status} and co.order_type in('order-term', 'order-no-term') and DATE_FORMAT(co.next_invoice_create_date, '%Y-%m') > DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') and co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_order_detail where pstn_number IS NOT NULL and pstn_number != '' ) and co.id in( select order_id from tm_customer_invoice where DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') < DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m') and id in( select MAX(id) from tm_customer_invoice group by order_id ) )

mapper.select: select count(*) from tm_customer_order as co left join tm_customer as c on c.id = co.customer_id
mapper.update: update tm_customer_order set svlan = null, cvlan = null, rfs_date = null where id = #{params.id}
update tm_customer_order set broadband_asid = null where id = #{params.id}
